english.segment1: Or you could be one more chance for hope
english.segment2: When I think of what could be. If we let our hearts believe. That it takes just one. Just one could turn this all around
english.segment3: And if we're living history. How will they think of you and me. If it takes just one, just one. What if, what if, what if I'm the one?
english.segment4: I see a nation without any walls. A beautiful haven for one and for all. I see a day when people are free. When shackles are broken and fall to the street
